name: Renewable Resources (Energy Solutions) Ltd
description: Renewable Resources are a fully accredited installation contractor for Solar Photovoltaic (PV). Coming from a commercial roofing background and fully qualified in PV installation, we offer a professional consultation, design and installation package to all our clients. Our in-house design team of qualified electrical engineers are fully trained in all aspects of design & installation. We are working actively in the domestic, commercial and public sectors helping these people and organisations lower their carbon emissions and generate an additional income through investing in renewable technology.
